column4: I'm trying to play a DVD in ubuntu using VLC, but it keeps failing on me with problems similar to this: http://lists.medibuntu.org/pipermail/bugs/2007-April/000181.html
Is there some magical trick to getting DVD playback working in Ubuntu?
don't know about VLC. For getting DVD to work, I install totem-xime and then I uninstall totem-gstreamer. That's all :)
